mapper.select: select m.material_code, m.material_name, m.company_code, c.company_name, unit_id, unit_no, cm.code_nm as mat_nm, save_stock, min_stock, max_stock, month_stock from material m, company c, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE cm where m.mat_id = cm.code_id and m.mat_no = cm.code and m.company_Code = c.company_Code
